snippet: Good design matters to Amanda Dameron, the editor in chief of Dwell, but no one in her home goes around screaming, ‘Don’t touch.’
abstract: Amanda Dameron, editor in chief of Dwell magazine, loves her Park Slope, Brooklyn brownstone apartment, filled with items that remind her and her husband of their childhoods.
lead_paragraph: Good design matters to Amanda Dameron, the editor in chief of Dwell, but no one in her home goes around screaming, ‘Don’t touch.’

headline.seo: Dwell Magazine's Amanda Dameron at Home
